name: Guy in a Ghillie v0.03
description:
"Guy in a Ghillie!"

Is a video game being developed by Preah Mungu LLC. This Demo involves a Playable character who must survive an oncoming invasion of a multitude of different enemies.

(This does not depict the overall of final version of the game)

Version 0.01 of Guy in a Ghillie is designed for Player(s) to become familiarized with the basic control scheme of the game as well as the overall concept of how things are.

Through each released version of "Guy in a Ghillie", a New Design, Technique, Skill, Level, Story and or Character will be added.

The overall goal for the finished product of "Guy in a Ghillie" is to create an Open World game that revolves around Horror, Survival, Adventure, Action, Puzzles and Much more.

The game takes inspiration from video games such as Deadspace, Deadrising, Mario Galaxy, Zombies Ate My Neighbors and Left 4 Dead with huge influence from the latter.

                                                       MESSAGE FROM DEVELOPER

"This game is in very early development and may or may not contain bugs. (no pun intended) 

If you would like to help with the process of this game feel free to send us an email or leave a message where its allowed.

This game is being developed as I get time to build it. I am building it out of passion but of course if donations happen, All donations will go directly to the progress of developing this game title specifically. "

Thanks for reading  and I hope that you enjoy Guy in a Ghillie!
